alarmId.description: Numerical value representing the alarm ID.

deleted.description: Indicates if an alarm has been deleted.

enabled.description: Indicates if an alarm is enabled.

recurring.description: Indicates if an alarm is recurring.

snoozeCount.description: Indicates the number of times the alarm will snooze.

snoozeLength.description: Indicates the time in minutes between snooze periods.

syncedToDevice.description: Indicates if the alarm is synced to the device.

time.description: The time and UTC offset for the specified alarm.

vibe.description: Returns the type of vibration configured.

weekDays.description: Returns the recurring days of the week which the alarm is set.

label.description: Label or name for the alarm.
